Robotics, Coding, & 3D Printing Actively: Operations: Cognition, Memory Retention, Convergent & Divergent Production, Evaluation. Content: Symbolic, Semantic, Behavioral. Products: Units, Classes, Relations, Systems.
Minimal Effect on: Content: Visual, Auditory. Products: Transformations, Implications.

Robotics, Coding, & 3D Printing Actively: Reasoning, Numerical Ability, Spatial Visualization, Perceptual Speed, Inductive Reasoning, Deductive Reasoning, Problem-Solving.
g Factor, Perceptual-Mechanical (k:m) Factor: Spatial, Practical, Mechanical Abilities.

Theory: Carroll's Three-Stratum Theory (The foundation for CHC)
Robotics, Coding, & 3D Printing Actively: Stratum III: g factor. Stratum II: Fluid Intelligence (Gf), Broad Visual Perception (Gv), Broad Cognitive Speediness (Gs), Broad Retrieval Ability (Gr).
Minimal Effect on: Stratum II: Crystallized Intelligence (Gc), Broad Auditory Perception (Gu), Quantitative Knowledge (Gq).

Robotics, Coding, & 3D Printing Actively: Fluid Intelligence (Gf) as 'raw intelligence' is invested in learning, which builds Crystallized Intelligence (Gc). The act of learning and applying these skills is the investment process itself.
Minimal Effect on: Crystallized Intelligence (Gc) is the result, not the process. The passive acquisition of facts without applying them.
